entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING IN EFFECT, Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to drizzle or showers near midnight. Fog. Amount 10 mm except 20 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Showers or drizzle. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog dissipating near noon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
